configurationName.description: Name of the configuration.  Referenced by jobs.

consistencyCheckerWeight.description: How often select generated jobs for processing.

migratorWeight.description: How often select non generated jobs for processing.

consistencyCheckerName.description: Name of the consistency checker responsible for this configuration

threadCount.description: Number of threads that should be devoted to migrator jobs

migratorClass.description: Class name of the migrator. If null, DefaultMigrator is used

consistencyCheckerControllerClass.description: Set this to the class name of a class extending AbstractController. If not set, ConsistencyCheckerController is used

overwriteDestinationDocuments.description: Controls whether or not documents are overwritten (allows for no-op migration)

comparisonExclusionPaths.description: Optional paths to exclude comparisons of source and destination documents.  Fields including arrays will apply to all elements in the array even if specific indexes are included.

destinationServiceURI.description: REST service URI for instance housing destination data.

destinationEntityName.description: destination Entity Name for data being migrated

destinationEntityVersion.description: destination Entity Version for data being migrated

destinationIdentityFields.description: identity fields in the destination entity.

sourceServiceURI.description: REST service URI for instance housing source data

sourceEntityName.description: source Entity Name for data being migrated

sourceEntityVersion.description: source Entity Version for data being migrated

timestampFieldName.description: Name of the timestamp field(s), for consistency checker. Can be comma separated list.

timestampInitialValue.description: Consistency checking will run for timestamps greater or equal to this date. This gets updated every time consistency checker runs

period.description: Period in which consistency checker runs. Must be nonempty for the consistency checker to run. something like 6 hours, 1 day, 1 seconds, etc. Units are millisecond, second, minute, hour, day

version.changelog: Weights for migrator and consistency checker
